text: NGC 445 is a peculiar lenticular galaxy located in the constellation of Cetus. It was discovered on October 23, 1864 by Albert Marth. It was described by Dreyer as "very faint, very small." ==References== ==External links== * 0445 18641023 Category:Cetus (constellation) Category:Lenticular galaxies Category:Discoveries by Albert Marth
title: NGC 445
